name: Polyverse (itch) (Isaac Games)
description:
Long ago the universe  was shattered into a myriad fragments. The quest for unity has led you to a verdant grove, where you find something strange ...

Arrow keys to move, Z and X to shift between dimensions

Made for Metroidvania Month XIV

Note: I'm still tweaking and polishing some things, I just wanted to get a playable build up early for better feedback.
